comment: Dr. Eggersman is a wonderful person and really cares about her students. At times, she meet me before and after class to help with any issues that I was having with the course. If you want someone who cares, this this professor.

Great Professor! She is very a bit older than your average teacher but she is very helpful and nice. She gives extra credit and will reply to your emails quickly. Just be patient, ask for help and she will be your best teacher.
Great professor. She worked with what was given. Gave lots of extra credit and attendance points. She really cared for her students and wanted to help everyone. Older but very nice. Exempts final!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Really sweet lady. Determined to give you an A if you attend class as much as possible. She pretty much does the projects for you during class, so make sure you go. She's super confusing, but I think she knows it, and I think that's why she just does the work for you. You need the books for all the quizzes but I never used the online access code.

Great professor overall. Very helpful and understanding.  I found the work load to be absolutely ridiculous for a lower level class. Projects each week that would take hours to complete. The group project was very unnecessary and it is graded unfairly for participation. (Group members recieved A's for doing nothing.)  quizzes were easy.

Dr. Eggersman is a very good professor and learned much about the Excel and Word programs. She really takes an interest in her students and always takes the time to help when needed. Highly recommend this professor!

If you actually want to learn something, don't take this professor. But if you need an easy A, this is the best class for you. I barely had to do anything. Buy the books cause you use them for her online tests. She basically gives you 100's on any discussions or projects as long as you actually do them. VERY EASY CLASS
Awesome teacher, super helpful and always there. she reply her emails so fast and helps you with everything she can. Loved her class. SUPER RECOMMENDED.

Dr. Eggersman makes this class easy. She responds to emails quickly and tells you everything in order to make a good grade on assignments. I would definitely recommend taking her if you don't do good in her class is because you just weren't paying attention.

The professor makes this class super easy. I can understand how she can make the class frustrating because she doesn't do a good job at explaining assignments. But she tells you everything you need to do in order to get a good grade. Like someone said the school makes the curriculum and she tells us the correct way to do it.

Took this course since it is required to apply for the Michael Coles School of Business. Lots of course work, but is expected since in the future, I am sure more will come. The instructor is very friendly and does what she can to help the students succeed. I would recommend this instructor if you want learn and succeed.

Took this course online and was very pleased that the instructor provided videos for the Web and Excel assignment since the latter was very difficult. Without the videos would have been very lost. Take this instructor since she is nice and responds to questions quickly.

It's an easy A class as long as you do all the work. There's a lot of busy work. She's a nice lady but can be vague on assignments. If you have questions, she'll email you back but to me I felt like she didn't really read what I asked and stated what I already knew, so it was super frustrating!

Read the two bad reviews concerning this course and instructor. The students do not realize, but the school creates the curriculum for this class, not the instructor. I really enjoyed this class and would recommend the instructor much since she returns assignments quickly and at times, lets you resubmit to get more points.

This class had a lot of busy work. I took it online. The material is straightforward, it's just how she delivers it. The quizzes were very easy but her assignments were not. Too confusing, huge, and sometimes irrelevant, for example, making a 10 slide power point for a hard excel assignment we turned in  weeks before.

If student listen and not interrupt Dr. Eggersman is a great teacher. She is willing to help after the material is read and it is still not understood. She post step by step videos to help with projects. She also will help review your work if you send it to her by e-mail. This way you see what you have done wrong. She is an awesome teacher.

In the middle of the course and have learned much so far. The instructor is very hands on and provides much information to ensure that the students understand the information given for assignments. Would recommend this instructor for students who struggle with Excel.

I am currently taking this class. It is the most poorly organized online class I've ever taken. The professor is very hands off. She doesn't really do anything in our class other than announce upcoming assignments with a note to let her know if we need anything, but when you ask her a question, she has an attitude and refers you back to the book.:(
Easy, EASY A. She's VERY nice and means so well. She takes attendance but classes never last the entire time. You'd be silly to take anyone but her for IS2200.

Interesting course and learned much from the instructor as to advanced Excel operations and especially business letter writing. In fact, the instructor had a speaker who came from the Writing Center to come speak about letter writing in the business environment. Would recommend this instructor for anyone who wants a good learning experience.

Learned much from Dr. Eggersman and would recommend her to anyone at KSU who has to take this course. The Excel assignment was difficult, but Dr. Eggersman made sure that everyone understood what to do to succeed at it. Do not know what the last person meant unless this person did not attend class.

No class longer lasted than 20 minutes, she always ran out of material or set the class loose to work on 'assignments'. Doesn't know how to teach a class to prepare students for a project and will instead give you every answer/solution. That said, IS2200 doesn't deliver much content worth learning, so the easy A was welcomed. Don't expect to learn.
